showerReviews.reviewText: some day it might be a truck stop. its just a convenience store with a little extra. No hours posted. went for shower at 10 minutes pass eleven, would not let us shower. this goes with the first time we stopped, there little deli did have ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the other posters was seeing. Staff friendly. Parking is small for large trucks but it not easily see from the highway. Defenatly must be planned in your trip. Food was good and clean location. Didn't take a shower but they have them here.
Does have showers. Simple but nice hot shower available for $10. Also can order food here. Minimal truck parking but not terribly busy.

‚Ä¶ of my experience, I got food which was good other than the cook put the wrong peppers on my burger, I also got a shower which was the size of a closet, no toilet no seat and the towels were dirty and the shower curtain kept falling down. On ‚Ä¶
Nice shower available, good coffees including decaf
BEST TRUCK STOP EVER... FOOD, SHOWER, PARKING A++++ - EMPLOYEES MAKE U FEEL HOME...

showerReviews.reviewText: The shower system announces your assigned number even when someone is already inside, which leads to confusion and overlap. ‚Ä¶

Didnt buy anything or shower this time I was here so I would feel silly for giving 5 stars but the store looks like its run efficiently. Smooth lot, not very much litter, nothing looks broken. Management team is doing a good job

It's just horrible!!!  more than an hour of waiting for a shower...!!  Almost empty parking lot..., almost no trucks and yet the worker is unable to prepare the shower...!!   Why keep such workers who do not want to work??   You don't want ‚Ä¶

Pretty clean this far!! Outside and in.
One of the only pilots where the employees clean toilets in shower rooms.
Shower was dirty and the water was barely warm at best
‚Ä¶ Big shower room, some pilots can be quite small. ‚Ä¶

Best shower EVER! Showered yesterday across the street because it's free on my loves account. It wasn't bad. Today showered at the Pilot and whoa! What a difference. Super hot water. Amazing water pressure. And everything was spotless. Even ‚Ä¶

driving for 10hrs tired. Just wanted to shower. 4 shower's open Just need to be cleaned. Found out 1 Guy who cleans showers is also picking up garbage out in the Yard. Ask for a assistance and lady at register elderly lady blond or red hair ‚Ä¶

Waited 50 minutes being the next for shower while at least 2 shower rooms widely open and available.
Happened multiple times.
‚Ä¶ From last theree months they close shower and they always use cheap shower body wash and hand wash. Today they close washroom as well. Whenever we enter the store never feel positive.

‚Ä¶ can't be heard in the wendys so if you're in wendys, you won't hear your number called. So, I had to wait for another shower in a busy afternoon.  The manager had and attitude like it wasn't his problem, gave me that "you're S O L  look ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to the girl that worked the Saturday evening shift on 6/24/2023. I wasn't going to spend over $200 on a hotel room and I needed a shower  as well as a place to sleep. I had never used a truck stop shower, and this facility was clean and ‚Ä¶

Fine loves.  Shower was a huge disappointment tho
Just a little hotter that's room temp
Barely any water pressure
Plus the water had that slimey feel
Better than no shower but i would've saved my credit if i knew

Spent 706.00 in fuel and was refused a shower for lack of loves card and then told had to pay 16.00 for a shower...I will not spend any more of my money at another loves again....horrible management in bath,ny.....

Friggin buy 102 gallons of diesel fuel I'd think I could get a free shower...
But Noooooo .... Oh you need a Love's card for shower.... I don't have a Love's card only fueled at loves twice.. never again !!!!

showerReviews.reviewText: I want to say that it was a good shower without dirt and smells. I got it for $12. Hot water and good pressure. The staff is really friendly.

‚Ä¶ Used my AmBest card to get a shower and received a towel and the key. Only 1 of 2 showers working tonight. Shower was clean enough. Sink, mirror, toilet, bench, paper mat, foam soap. In the shower there was liquid shower gel, shampoo, and a ‚Ä¶

The Best Showers üöø for my last week

Absolutely good area and service

Yes, some parking lot for trucks small but You have many reasons to try come here

P.S. I'll be back üòé

Sorry pictures I did after using shower lol ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Burger King and plenty of selection of many items, but the service for the truck drivers who want to take a shower, since the make over showers are now available for those drivers far from home the service that provides the towels is ‚Ä¶
75 gallons for a shower, more than most places. ‚Ä¶
Pretty friendly people. Shower rooms are small but showers are free with 50 gallons of fuel. No DEF at pumps. Pretty Clean, well maintained. Decent amount of parking.
Store was clean and the people are friendly.only issue is that shower 2 floods the whole bathroom causing mold to be growing. Hate to see a good place go bad because a simple issue is not fixed.
I took a shower at this place. It was excellent! open 24 hours. I‚Äôll give them five stars.
Small place. 3 fuel pumps. 50 gallons gets you shower coupon and drink, coffee or fountain drink. Showers are small, camode is in separate room from shower room. Open 24/7. Friendly staff.

showerReviews.reviewText: Place is dirty had no food at 6:30 in the morning coffee was old and the towels that you shower with was on the floor in the men‚Äôs bathroom around the toilet disgusting

I've been a OTR truck driver for 6 years now and I take a shower every day or the next day! And never been to a Pilot's or Flying J's bathroom so clean before... "Lary" has been doing and amazing job at this Pilot and should be rewarded... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the warmer at 8:15pm and it was completely bare then I went in,in the am to get coffee and breakfast and it was the same thing.shower 4 the shower was running almost full tilt when I got in there and that is because it would not turn off.

Trying to figure out WHY no showers for several days. I Was told "problem with the hot water"  but when you use the sink to wash your hands it's hot... Hmmm get  your act together.  When you go home do you not have a hot shower? All we all ‚Ä¶
Not one deserves, bad treatment and they have no shower ready, wait a day for shower
My place to stop when coming back to Canada, lovely place, always parking, shower kept well clean highly recommend !

Good service with one or two exceptions. The food service in Denny's was good and the shower was ok but I went to the building in the very early hours to find only one person on visible duty, the coffee area was a complete mess because he ‚Ä¶

Looks good.
Hot shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: Took a shower, ate at Dennis, and had pot roast, green beans, and Mac n cheese from FlyingJ. The store is clean and has a good selection of snacks, kids toys, and about everything they normally do, but this one at least has filled shelves. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Cool truck stop. Downside for me was the low water pressure in the shower and no wireless pay for the laundry room. Can use quarters or credit card. Iron skillet breakfast was good except for my scrambled eggs were a little runny for my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ go to loves because my trucking company prefers me using them however  when I tried going to the loves across the street their showers were down and they were quite rude about it. so I walked out and came over to this truck stop and the ‚Ä¶

Basically has no food unless you want chips or iron skillet.

My shower was really nice.

Staff are really nice people.

I only stop at petro/target occasionally but this location is pretty great! The lady at the diesel desk is super friendly and the shower was nice and clean!

Seems like a huge lot, with lots of parking.
Will definitely stop by next time.

‚Ä¶ over been Over!  Prices are pretty extremely high . Food is too high your going to lose business.. showers are WAY TOO HIGH . . DIESEL AND SHOP PAY PLENTY  for a shower to be at most $10.00  18.00 is robbing ppl.. come on .. I won't be back ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ experience was horrible. I'm still hungry after spending $20 on a dinner. And to top it off I had no water pressure in the shower and the room was maybe 50¬∞. Very disappointed in what T/A- Petro is doing to the drivers. A year later and ‚Ä¶

The place is clean, friendly and very convenient. The lady at the store help me to get my shower ticket and the waitress at the restaurant was joking with us. It was the best customer service I had in 2016 so far. I recommend this place to ‚Ä¶

employees are friendly but the place needs some work. The fuel pumps don‚Äôt work and leaks, shower Rooms are ok plenty of room. I like this place because of the huge parking lots and it‚Äôs not tight like some places have been to. The ‚Ä¶
Travelling across New York State and stopped by this Truck stop with my family to take a shower and freshen up. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the workout, all I experienced was super friendly, courteous, professional and absolutely polite service from all the staff. Even at the shop..... My shower stall this morning huge and clean as well. Good water pressure too.... Good stop.
